hero_subtitle: Sustainable eco-tourism led by Daniel Bayona
about_text: Kururu is an eco-tourism business founded by Daniel Bayona, dedicated to showcasing the pristine beauty of Colombia's Amazon rainforest while promoting conservation and sustainable travel. Our tours are designed to provide authentic experiences that respect local communities and the environment.
jungle_desc: Explore the canopy and spot exotic wildlife in guided treks.
river_desc: Navigate the Amazon rivers and discover hidden waterways.
birdwatching_desc: Observe colorful birds in their natural habitat.
community_desc: Immerse yourself in local culture and traditions.
guide_desc: Led by Daniel Bayona and his team of experienced guides.
carbon_desc: All tours are designed with minimal environmental impact.
small_desc: Intimate experiences with groups of 6-12 people.
